item.description:
Join us for our second 45 Plus Singles Social Meetup Group of Rhode Island and Southern MA. Join us on Sunday, May 31th at 6:00 pm at the Hi Hat in Providence RI for our second social event.

If you have any ideas for organizing and event planning please bring them with you i.e., travel, museums, dancing, networking, sports events, etc.

Volunteers welcome and bring a friend!

For those interested, The Hi Hat offers food and music.

RSVP Audrey at AudreysSocial@aol.com

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: 45 Plus Singles Social Meetup Group of RI & Southern MA May Meetup
